locations.address: Jose Abad Santos Dr, Baguio, 2600 Benguet
locations.details: In 1905, American  Daniel Hudson Burnham envisioned Burnham Park as part of a larger plan for the city of Baguio. Burnham delegated the task of interpreting the preliminary plans for Baguio and Manila to William E. Parsons after presenting them. Burnham Park is located in what was formerly known as "Baguio Meadow," and his role in establishing the park is commemorated by a bust bearing his likeness and a plaque at one end of the park.
